## Is Down

> Check whether a website is down or not

## Screenshot

<img src="https://gitlab.com/yoginth/isdown/raw/master/Screenshot.png" width="550">

## Install

```
$ pip install isdown
```

## Usage

```python
import isdown

isdown.check('google.com')
#=> False
```
